DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effectiveness addition interferential current Pilates method exercise treatment 148 patient chronic nonspecific low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Addition Interferential Current Pilates Method Treatment Chronic Nonspecific Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Sedentary patient chronic nonspecific low back pain longer 12 week Pain great three point Pain Numerical Rating Scale Contra indication physical exercise Serious spinal pathology ( e.g . tumor , fracture inflammatory disease ) Nerve root compromise Pregnancy Infection and/or skin lesion site application interferential current Cancer Cardiac pacemaker Changes sensitivity allergy region electrode placement Previous surgery spine physical therapy chronic nonspecific low back pain last six month Previous experience Pilates method
